SEARCH
Package src.main.java.arimaa.game

Class Square

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.arimaa.game.Square
public class Square extends Object
Represents a square on an Arimaa game board. Each square has a column and a row, and can hold a piece. Squares can also be traps, which have special rules.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new square with the given column and row, and whether it is a trap.

    • isAdjacent

      public boolean isAdjacent(Square other)
      Returns whether the square is adjacent to another square. Two squares are adjacent if they are next to each other horizontally or vertically.
      Parameters:
      other - The other square to check.
      Returns:
      true if the square is adjacent to the other square, false otherwise.
